name: Thunderclap Slash!
effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
description: Ineffa's specialty. Ineffa shouts "Thunderclap Slash!" impassively as krumkakes are launched one after another from her empty arm socket, landing with precision on the plate before you. Intricate patterns and a sweet, delightful flavor confirm the maker's culinary excellence. Your taste buds have no choice but to surrender to the all-conquering "Thunderclap Slash."
